sentences.sContent: The company serves the national automotive aftermarket with a broad range of accessory and recreational-vehicle products.
sentences.sCn: 该公司为全国机动车售后市场提供各种配件和休闲车产品。

synos.tran: 零件市场；二级市场（等于secondary market）

trans.tranOther: The aftermarket is all the related products that are sold after an item, especially a car, has been bought
